name: Lego Dimensions: Adventure Time Team Pack
summary: What the jug?! Lumpy Space Princess and Jake the Dog are ready to embark on an adventure in the Lego Dimensions Multiverse! Get ready for fun in the Adventure Time Adventure World and Battle Arena with extra-awesome abilities like Slurp Access, Grapple Swing and Shape Shift. When you need to take off in a hurry, jump into the Lumpy Car or have BMO give you a lift. Then rebuild the Lumpy Car into the Lumpy Truck and Lumpy Land Whale, and BMO into DOGMO and SNAKEMO.
